'''Teyvat Fried Egg''' is a [[Food Card|Food]] [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

== Gameplay Notes ==
* Using Teyvat Fried Egg on a character will not return any Energy, Equipment, or Statuses.
* If a character that is already Satiated becomes defeated, the Satiated state is removed, so this card can be used on characters that have already consumed Food this Round, provided the player has not revived characters yet.
